item.title:
RT by @lxjhk: Solayer InfiniSVM - Scaling Solana, Turbocharged!
Solana is fast, but it's hitting hardware limits, which is why we've seen slowdowns during the Solana meme boom.
What's next? @solayer_labs introduces InfiniSVM, a hardware-accelerated SVM blockchain designed to unlock incredible TPS and keep @solana's vision alive.
item.dc:creator: @defi_mago
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @lxjhk: Everyone hypes up Solana‚Äôs speed, but let‚Äôs be real, it has limits
When things get busy, transactions slow down. Fees pile up. It‚Äôs not as smooth as it should be
InfiniSVM by @Solayer_Labs fixes that
No bridges. No extra fees. Just raw, hardware-powered speed
Let's learn üîª

item.title:
RT by @lxjhk: Solana is fast, but it‚Äôs hitting a limit.
Validators are pushing 0.8 Gbps, nearing consumer internet capacity,
leading to dropped transactions, slippage, and congestion.
The truth is, software alone can‚Äôt fix this.
Now, this is where @solayer_labs' InfiniSVM comes in.
A üßµ.

item.title:
RT by @lxjhk: Introducing Our Keynote Speaker: Jason Li (@lxjhk), Co-founder of @solayer_labs !
We‚Äôre thrilled to welcome Jason Li to the stage at Bitcoin & Stablecoin Open House ‚Äì Side Event to Consensus Hong Kong 2025!
As Co-founder of Solayer, Jason has been at the forefront of Bitcoin infrastructure and innovation, driving new possibilities in BTCFi and beyond. His keynote will dive into the evolving landscape of Bitcoin & Stablecoin adoption in Asia, exploring how institutional players and builders are shaping the next era of digital assets.
üìÖ Date: February 19, 2025 üìç Location: Fringe Club, Hong Kong
Don‚Äôt miss this exclusive opportunity to hear from one of the key minds in the space. Seats are filling fast‚Äîsecure yours now! üëá
üîó Register here: https://lu.ma/u5qdqr6k

item.title:
RT by @lxjhk: Check out our investment thesis for why we co-led the seed round of @solayer_labsüëá
We originally were excited about Solayer as a shared security / restaking network that used SOL to secure other Solana-integrated systems.
However, the vision for Solayer has expanded and is much broader than solely (pun intended) SOL restaking.
Congrats to the entire Solayer team on the successful token launch yesterday! We look forward to the journey ahead together.
item.dc:creator: @hack_vc
item.description:
Check out our investment thesis for why we co-led the seed round of @solayer_labsüëá

We originally were excited about Solayer as a shared security / restaking network that used SOL to secure other Solana-integrated systems.

However, the vision for Solayer has expanded and is much broader than solely (pun intended) SOL restaking.

Congrats to the entire Solayer team on the successful token launch yesterday! We look forward to the journey ahead together.

item.title:
RT by @lxjhk: SIMD-96 is live on Epoch 741 (just started)
what is this mean for stakers and sSOL holders?
SIMD-96 is a change where 100% of priority fees are rewarded to validators (previously 50%)
this will increase the staking income and help to further improve the performance of sSOL ü´°
item.dc:creator: @0xJsum
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @lxjhk: Congrats on the $LAYER TGE @solayer_labs
some notes: - Grown to $300M+ TVL for the restaking product
- Not just restaking, also built a v high TPS SVM chain which is secured by the restaking layer
- Spot price is $0.85 and perps are at $0.78 with -8000% funding... so if you're holding it might be worth selling spot and buying perp to collect the free arb + extremely high funding yields
- IDO price was $0.35 with no vest so nice W for those that participated
- Very low liq on chain so careful not to slip too much if trading off cex
note: dcf cap seeded solayer
item.dc:creator: @dcfgod
item.description:
Congrats on the $LAYER TGE @solayer_labs

some notes:
- Grown to $300M+ TVL for the restaking product

- Not just restaking, also built a v high TPS SVM chain which is secured by the restaking layer

- Spot price is $0.85 and perps are at $0.78 with -8000% funding... so if you're holding it might be worth selling spot and buying perp to collect the free arb + extremely high funding yields

- IDO price was $0.35 with no vest so nice W for those that participated

- Very low liq on chain so careful not to slip too much if trading off cex

note: dcf cap seeded solayer

item.title:
RT by @lxjhk: You asked, I (try) to deliver.
I've had this question myself for a long time, but it wasn't until today until I got it.
How to set up a single sided @MeteoraAG DLMM pool, AKA: how do I sell my memecoin without FSHing the chart but also earning fees while selling.
READY?
